Comments_List: I learned about d-orbitals, transition metals, catalysis, green chemistry applications, and good empirical practices

If a course is going to focus on applications, I think it could be better taught as a seminar with a signed readings and discussion. I felt like I got very little out of all the papers and specific catalysts we were shown on slides.
